mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user_qhzx_blacklist (data_build_time,id,batch_no, id_no, id_type, reason_code, name, entity_auth_code, entity_auth_date, seq_no, source_id, grade_query, money_bound, data_status, state, er_code, er_msg, create_time, update_time,total_info_id,trans_no) values( #{dataBuildTime},#{id},#{batchNo}, #{idNo}, #{idType}, #{reasonCode}, #{name}, #{entityAuthCode}, #{entityAuthDate}, #{seqNo}, #{sourceId}, #{gradeQuery}, #{moneyBound}, #{dataStatus}, #{state}, #{erCode}, #{erMsg}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime},#{totalInfoId},#{transNo})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_user_qhzx_blacklist where id_no=#{idNo} and id_type=#{idType} and name=#{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user_qhzx_blacklist SET batch_no=#{batchNo}, seq_no=#{seqNo}, source_id=#{sourceId}, grade_query=#{gradeQuery}, money_bound=#{moneyBound}, data_status=#{dataStatus}, state=#{state}, er_code=#{erCode}, er_msg=#{erMsg}, data_build_time=#{dataBuildTime}, update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE id_no=#{idNo} and id_type=#{idType} and name=#{name}
